about_the_game:
This game is a puzzle, thriller, horror, visual novel, RPG game, the overall style belongs to the pixel steampunk style
In the steampunk world of the Apocalypse, detective Alice Veil is investigating a serial murder,
Unfortunately is in the investigation by the killer shot dead, however everything is just beginning.....

The difficulty of the game needs to be reasonable allocation of collected resources, low level players do not download experience


If you encounter any problems with the game, please feel free to comment to me on the Steam community and I will fix them immediately
Since this is an experience version, I hope you can give me more feedback so that I can keep improving the quality of the game
You can also follow the author bilibili's official account for feedback
The main language of this work is simplified Chinese. If there are any grammar errors in other languages, please leave a message in the Steam community and I will fix them immediately

To switch to the language category, please enter the Steam library right click on the game, go to the properties to select the language
detailed_description:
This game is a puzzle, thriller, horror, visual novel, RPG game, the overall style belongs to the pixel steampunk style
In the steampunk world of the Apocalypse, detective Alice Veil is investigating a serial murder,
Unfortunately is in the investigation by the killer shot dead, however everything is just beginning.....

The difficulty of the game needs to be reasonable allocation of collected resources, low level players do not download experience


If you encounter any problems with the game, please feel free to comment to me on the Steam community and I will fix them immediately
Since this is an experience version, I hope you can give me more feedback so that I can keep improving the quality of the game
You can also follow the author bilibili's official account for feedback
The main language of this work is simplified Chinese. If there are any grammar errors in other languages, please leave a message in the Steam community and I will fix them immediately

To switch to the language category, please enter the Steam library right click on the game, go to the properties to select the language

name: 时空梦魇Ⅰ代号608

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or bette
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB, Radeon HD 4870 512 MB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card

short_description: In the apocalyptic world of steampunk, detective Alice Weir investigates a serial murder case, Unfortunately, he was shot dead by a killer during the investigation, but everything was just beginning.....
